TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlException extends System.Exception

summary.span: The exception that is thrown for a general XAML reader or XAML writer exception.

span.span: The exception that is thrown for a general XAML reader or XAML writer exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更明確的例外狀況，例如存在，而且通常會擲回而不是。More specific exceptions such as exist and are often thrown instead of . 特定的例外狀況通常會提供更精確的例外狀況資訊為屬性的例外狀況，或只是因為引發特定例外狀況。Specific exceptions typically provide more precise exception information as properties of the exception, or just because the specific exception was raised.

summary.span: The instance contains a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

span.span: The instance contains a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為前一個例外狀況應該包含在前一個例外狀況的參考，會擲回的例外狀況屬性。An exception that is thrown because a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或其傳回`null`如果屬性不提供內部例外值給建構函式。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor; or it returns `null` if the property does not provide the inner exception value to the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Message { get; }
.property instance string Message
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the exception message, and if line information is available, appends the line information to the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the exception message, and if line information is available, appends the line information to the message.

value.span: 例外狀況訊息，其中包含附加的行資訊。

span.span: The exception message that includes the appended line information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫這個屬性讓行資訊直接包含在訊息，因此更輕鬆地顯示偵錯工具或其他例外狀況的取用者。 overrides this property so that line information is directly included in the message and is therefore more easily visible for debuggers or other exception consumers. 行資訊是否可用，此屬性會包含行資訊。If line information is available, this property includes the line information. 如果行資訊無法使用時，訊息等同於基底訊息。If line information is unavailable, the message is the same as the base message.
